name: functional-programming-utilities
description: Holder of various Functional Programming utilities

scripts.cover: babel-node node_modules/isparta/bin/isparta cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --colors --reporter spec
scripts.lint: npm run lint:lib && npm run lint:src&& npm run lint:test
scripts.compile: npm run compile:lib && npm run compile:src
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run cover

author: Carlos de Dios
